verses.verse: The words <S%H1697><s%> of Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hilkiah, <S%H2518><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were in Anathoth <S%H6068><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%>

to whom <S%H834><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Josiah, <S%H2977><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amon, <S%H526><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> in the thirteenth <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of his reign. <S%H4427><s%>

It came <S%H1961><s%> also in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jehoiakim, <S%H3079><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah, <S%H2977><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the end <S%H8552><s%> of the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Zedekiah, <S%H6667><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah, <S%H2977><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the exile <S%H1540><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>
Now the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Before <S%H2962><s%> I formed <S%H3335><s%> you in the womb <S%H990><s%> I knew <S%H3045><s%> you, And before <S%H2962><s%> you were born <S%H3318><s%> <S%H7358><s%> I consecrated <S%H6942><s%> you; I have appointed <S%H5414><s%> you a prophet <S%H5030><s%> to the nations. <S%H1471><s%>"

Then I said, <S%H559><s%> "Alas, <S%H162><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> God! <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I do not know <S%H3045><s%> how to speak, <S%H1696><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> I am a youth. <S%H5288><s%>"

But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Do not say, <S%H559><s%> 'I am a youth, <S%H5288><s%>' Because <S%H3588><s%> everywhere <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> I send <S%H7971><s%> you, you shall go, <S%H1980><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> that I command <S%H6680><s%> you, you shall speak. <S%H1696><s%>
"Do not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of them, For I am with you to deliver <S%H5337><s%> you," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> stretched <S%H7971><s%> out His hand <S%H3027><s%> and touched <S%H5060><s%> my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have put <S%H5414><s%> My words <S%H1697><s%> in your mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

"See, <S%H7200><s%> I have appointed <S%H6485><s%> you this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> the kingdoms, <S%H4467><s%> To pluck <S%H5428><s%> up and to break <S%H5422><s%> down, <S%H5422><s%> To destroy and to overthrow, <S%H6><s%> To build <S%H2040><s%> and to plant. <S%H1129><s%>"

And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> do you see, <S%H7200><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>?" And I said, <S%H559><s%> "I see <S%H7200><s%> a rod <S%H4731><s%> of an almond <S%H8247><s%> tree. <S%H8247><s%>"

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, "You have seen <S%H7200><s%> well, <S%H3190><s%> for I am watching <S%H8245><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> My word <S%H1697><s%> to perform <S%H6213><s%> it."

And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me a second <S%H8145><s%> time <S%H8145><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> do you see <S%H7200><s%>?" And I said, <S%H559><s%> "I see <S%H7200><s%> a boiling <S%H5301><s%> pot, <S%H5518><s%> facing <S%H6440><s%> away from the north. <S%H6828><s%>"

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Out of the north <S%H6828><s%> the evil <S%H9567><s%> will break <S%H6605><s%> forth <S%H6605><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

"For, behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am calling <S%H7121><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the families <S%H4940><s%> of the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the north, <S%H6828><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> "and they will come, <S%H935><s%> and they will set <S%H5414><s%> each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> at the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gates <S%H8179><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> its walls <S%H2346><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about, <S%H5439><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

"And I will pronounce <S%H1696><s%> My judgments <S%H4941><s%> on them concerning <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their wickedness, <S%H9567><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> they have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> Me and have offered <S%H6999><s%> sacrifices <S%H6999><s%> to other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and worshiped <S%H7812><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of their own hands. <S%H3027><s%>

"Now, gird <S%H247><s%> up your loins, <S%H4975><s%> and arise, <S%H6965><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> to them all <S%H3605><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you. Do not be dismayed <S%H2865><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them, lest <S%H6435><s%> I dismay <S%H2865><s%> you before <S%H6440><s%> them.

"Now behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have made <S%H5414><s%> you today <S%H3117><s%> as a fortified <S%H4013><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> and as a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%> and as walls <S%H2346><s%> of bronze <S%H5178><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> to the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> to its princes, <S%H8269><s%> to its priests <S%H3548><s%> and to the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

"And they will fight <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H413><s%> you, but they will not overcome <S%H3201><s%> you, for I am with you to deliver <S%H5337><s%> you," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
